column4: This drives me crazy..... I need to install Openoffice Base. When looking at the repos there are 2 versions 3.2.0-7Ubuntu4.1 and 3.2.0-7Ubuntu4 ... what's the difference and which one do I install that works with the default installed in 10.04??
I'd go ahead and put the 4.1 files on
all other things being equal you should install most recent
I was thinking that the 4.1 was development version.. but I could be wrong
